description:
Mesa 25.1 open-source graphics stack will use Zink and NVK instead of Nouveau for NVIDIA GPU users in terms of the default graphics driver.

The post Mesa 25.1 to Replace Nouveau Driver with Zink/NVK by Default for NVIDIA GPUs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mesa 25.1 to Replace Nouveau Driver with Zink/NVK by Default for NVIDIA GPUs

description:
KDE Plasma 6.3.3 desktop environment is now available with various improvements and numerous fixes for bugs, crashes, and other issues. Here are the details!

title: KDE Plasma 6.3.3 Implements Battery Charge Threshold Support for More Devices

description:
IPFire 2.29 Core Update 192 open-source hardened Linux firewall is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.12 LTS and other changes. Here’s what’s new!

The post IPFire Hardened Linux Firewall Distro Is Now Powered by Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: IPFire Hardened Linux Firewall Distro Is Now Powered by Linux Kernel 6.12 LTS

description:
LXQt 2.2 desktop environment promises many Wayland improvements, QTerminal updates, and various other enhancements. Here’s what to expect from the upcoming release in mid-April 2025.
